summary: MY 2003 CHEVY TRAILBLAZER HAS BEEN TAKEN TO DEALERSHIP 2X FOR A PROBLEM WITH THE AIR CONDITIONER.  BOTH TIMES THE DEALER STATED THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH THE TRUCK.  MY AIR CONDITIONER DOES NOT WORK!  TO ADD TO THE PROBLEMS THERE IS NO COLD OR EVEN COOL AIR FROM THE VENT POSITION.  THE AIR IS VERY HOT!  *JB
